0.entity_description: Feeling of belonging and social connection fostered through participation in sports.

0.entity_name: people from different backgrounds and beliefs
0.entity_description: Individuals with diverse cultural and ideological identities brought together by sports.
Shared enthusiasm and interest that unites diverse people around sports.
Social or cultural obstacles that sports can help to break down.
Individuals who participate in sports and can use their public presence to influence social and economic issues.
Excitement and emotional intensity produced by sporting contests.
Sense of friendship and solidarity among sports spectators.
Motivational influence that athletes exert on individuals and communities.
Divisions or separations between people that sports can transcend.
Connections formed between people and groups through sports.
Single persons who participate in or are affected by sports.
Groups of people whose culture and cohesion can be shaped by sports.

1.entity_description: Differences in spoken or written languages that can hinder communication between people.
Differences and separations between people or nations due to political views or systems.
